Events.Text: Somebody has transferred $500 from your account. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Someone took $500 from my account. Can you help?
You are Sarah Brown. Your PIN is 7402, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Poppy.) [instruction 2 of 5]
name
Could I get your full name, please?
My name is Sarah Brown
account PIN
May I have your account number and PIN number, please?
My PIN is 7402. I can't remember my account number.
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
birth
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
I got tickets to see Falco. I hope they arrived. He is playing at the Royal Albert Hall. He is the greatest performer ever. What was I doing?
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
sorry
I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you issue fraud reports.
Amadeus, Amadeus, oh oh, Amadeus. I hear the tune in my head. So catchy.
birth
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
My date of birth is 1922, carry the one, add three... I can't do all that math in my head.
pet
And what was the name of the pet you had as a child?
My poor Poppy. She was named after my aunt Polly Gray. Why we called her Poppy, is beyond me. How do you get Poppy from Polly?
maiden
What was your mother's maiden name?
My mother was never married. She had no maiden name. I was born...it was a miracle!
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]

Item.Message: You must provide either AccountNumber/FullName/PIN or FullName/DateOfBirth/SecurityAnswer1/SecurityAnswer2. We cannot authenticate the user otherwise.

Events.Text: authenticate

Events.Text: I am sorry, but I cannot authenticate you with the information you have provided.
Oh boo hoo. I'll have to talk to Samwell. He is a genius of a boy. He will know what to do. Thank you anyway.

Events.Text: goodbye

PrimaryItem.Message: You must provide either AccountNumber/FullName/PIN or FullName/DateOfBirth/SecurityAnswer1/SecurityAnswer2. We cannot authenticate the user otherwise.

Events.Text: Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
